rows.label: tlk70000120_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, you guys!
I hear you're going to kick off a huge
ruckus.

rows.label: tlk70000120_05_msg0002
rows.name:
Then take me with you! Let's show
that Holy Grail who's boss!

rows.label: tlk70000120_05_msg0003
rows.name:
Huh? You just want moral support?
Ah... Well, OK, I won't interfere...

rows.label: tlk70000120_05_msg0004
rows.name:
I know I'd just get in your way
anyway...

rows.label: tlk70000120_05_msg0005
rows.name:
But I really want to do something
to help you out.

rows.label: tlk70000120_05_msg0006
rows.name:
Now you're the great hope, and not
just for Iira, but for Gula too!

rows.label: tlk70000120_05_msg0007
rows.name:
I'm sure you'll succeed!
And that's from a gallant Gulan
knight like me! No mistake!
